casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. ABERNATHY
v.
LUCAS CTY. BD. OF ELECTIONS 2018-1824 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 31, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Prohibition. On motion for leave to intervene as respondents of Julian C. Mack, Sean M. Nester, and Brian Twitchell. Motion granted.
